factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

source.query:
SELECT id, 
UPPER(TRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(name, ',', 1),'[',''),'''',''))) AS  name
from status_table

select DISTINCT
t.id,
created_at,
updated_at,
timestampdiff(HOUR,created_at,updated_at) AS `hours_between`,
timestampdiff(MINUTE,created_at,updated_at) AS `minutes_between`,
CAST(company_id AS SIGNED)  as companiaCodigo,
cast(`status` as SIGNED) as estadoCodigo, 
cast(`type` as SIGNED) as tipoCodigo, 
cast(tt.id as SIGNED) as tipoid,
cast(product_id as SIGNED) as productoCodigo, 
cast(group_id as SIGNED)as grupoCodigo, 
cast(`source` as SIGNED) as origenCodigo,
cast(`priority` as SIGNED) as prioridadCodigo,
cast(`responder_id` as SIGNED) as agenteCodigo
from freshdesk_tickets t
left join ticket_type tt on tt.name = t.type

text.value:
@concat('insert into stg.conversaciones (id, created_at, updated_at) values (',variables('vTicket_id')[0].ticket_id,
    pipeline().parameters.DelimitadorComa,
    pipeline().parameters.DelimitarioCommilaSimple,
    variables('vTicket_id')[0].created_at,
    pipeline().parameters.DelimitarioCommilaSimple,
    pipeline().parameters.DelimitadorComa,
    pipeline().parameters.DelimitarioCommilaSimple,
    variables('vTicket_id')[0].updated_at,
    pipeline().parameters.DelimitarioCommilaSimple,')')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT codigo as id FROM [stg].[Tickets] 
WHERE fechaAlta >  dateadd(day,-40,getdate())
order by codigo

select
t.codigo,
t.fechaAlta,
t.fechaModificacion,
c.id companiaId,
e.id estadoId,
tt.id  tipoId,
p.id productoId,
g.id grupoId,
o.id origenId,
pr.id prioridadId,
a.id agenteId,
sla.id slaId,
case 
    when pr.codigo = 1 then sla.slaTargerPriority1ResolveWithin /60
    when pr.codigo = 2 then sla.slaTargerPriority2ResolveWithin /60
    when pr.codigo = 3 then sla.slaTargerPriority3ResolveWithin /60
    when pr.codigo = 4 then sla.slaTargerPriority4ResolveWithin /60
end SlaResolucion,
case 
    when pr.codigo = 1 then sla.slaTargetPriority1RespondWithin /60
    when pr.codigo = 2 then sla.slaTargetPriority2RespondWithin /60
    when pr.codigo = 3 then sla.slaTargetPriority3RespondWithin /60
    when pr.codigo = 4 then sla.slaTargetPriority4RespondWithin /60
end SlaRespuesta,
presp.FechaPrimerRespuesta,
horasDiferecia,
minutosDiferencia

from stg.tickets t 
left join whs.dimCompanias c on c.codigo = t.companiaCodigo
left join whs.dimEstados e on e.codigo = t.estadoCodigo
left join whs.dimTiposTicket tt on tt.codigo = t.tipoCodigo
left join whs.dimProductos p on p.codigo = t.productoCodigo
left join whs.dimGrupos g on g.codigo = t.grupoCodigo
left join whs.dimOrigenes o on o.codigo = t.origenCodigo
left join whs.dimPrioridades pr on pr.codigo = t.prioridadCodigo
left join whs.dimAgentes a on a.codigo = t.agenteCodigo
left join whs.dimSla sla on sla.companyid = t.companiaCodigo or sla.nombre = 'Default SLA Policy' and sla.isactive = 1
left join (
                select id codigo,
            min(created_at) FechaPrimerRespuesta
            from stg.Conversaciones where id = 92984
            group by id
            ) presp on presp.codigo = t.codigo
